mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_system_scm_submit_regex( SYSTEM_ID, SYSTEM_SCM_REPOSITORY_ID, SCM_REPOSITORY_NAME, REGEX, SUBMIT_USER_NAMES, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{systemId}, #{systemScmRepositoryId}, #{scmRepositoryName}, #{regex}, #{submitUserNames}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT tssr.ID, tssr.SYSTEM_ID, tssr.SYSTEM_SCM_REPOSITORY_ID, tssr.SCM_REPOSITORY_NAME, tssr.REGEX, tssr.SUBMIT_USER_NAMES
FROM tbl_system_scm_submit_regex tssr WHERE tssr.STATUS = 1 AND tssr.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId}

SELECT tssr.ID, tssr.SYSTEM_ID, tssr.SYSTEM_SCM_REPOSITORY_ID, tssr.SCM_REPOSITORY_NAME, tssr.REGEX, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(tui.USER_SCM_ACCOUNT) FROM tbl_user_info tui WHERE FIND_IN_SET(tui.ID,tssr.SUBMIT_USER_NAMES)) AS "SUBMIT_USER_NAMES" FROM tbl_system_scm_submit_regex tssr WHERE tssr.STATUS = 1 AND tssr.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND tssr.SYSTEM_SCM_REPOSITORY_ID = #{systemScmRepositoryId} AND tssr.SCM_REPOSITORY_NAME = #{scmRepositoryName}
